awd_titl_txt: Engineering Creativity Award: Investigation of Transverse-  Write Magnetooptic-Read Magnetic Recording System
awd_abstract_narration: Investigate a new, original approach which combines the                    advantages of magneto-optic recording and transverse magnetic                   recording.  The technique uses a transverse recording method for                the storage of digital information combined with magneto-optics                 for the readback process.  The study includes an investigation of               the magneto-optic and micro-magnetic properties of various                      thin-film materials.  The Bloch wall form is used to provide                    increased storage capacities in addition to less stringent                      quality control at the manufacturing stage and a reduced risk of                head crash during operations.                                                        This project is one supported under the Creativity Awards                  for Undergraduate Engineering Students.
org_div_long_name: Division of Engineering Education and Centers
